info.title: Open a filled in, collapsed combobox in reading mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToComboboxAndSetValueToAlabama
setupScript.description: sets focus on the combobox, and sets the combobox value to 'Alabama'

user: With the reading cursor on the combobox, open the combobox without moving into the listbox popup.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the combobox, open the combobox without moving into the listbox popup.
instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.

assertions.expectation: Change in state (to expanded) is conveyed
